meanings.definition: Spending less money than is necessary.
meanings.sent1: The scrimpy sandwich was much scrimpier than the hearty burger.
meanings.sent2: Her scrimpy allowance made her feel scrimpier than her friends.
meanings.sent3: He felt scrimpy when he realized he forgot his wallet at home.
meanings.sent4: The scrimpy savings account left her feeling even scrimpier.
meanings.sent5: The scrimpy budget made their vacation plans even scrimpier than expected.

meanings.definition: Having less of something than is needed.
meanings.sent1: The scrimpy portion was even scrimpier than she had anticipated.
meanings.sent2: Their scrimpy supplies made the situation even scrimpier.
meanings.sent3: He felt scrimpy when he realized he forgot his lunch at home.
meanings.sent4: The scrimpy resources left them feeling even scrimpier.
meanings.sent5: The scrimpy wardrobe made her outfit choices even scrimpier than usual.

meanings.definition: To be more frugal or economical.
meanings.sent1: She decided to scrimper on groceries to save money.
meanings.sent2: They scrimper on utilities to reduce their bills.
meanings.sent3: He tried to scrimper on gas by carpooling with friends.
meanings.sent4: The family had to scrimper on gifts this year.
meanings.sent5: They scrimper on decorations to stay within budget.
